title: The French kinges declaration vpon the riot, felonie, and rebellion of the duke of Mayenne & the duke and knight of Aumalle, and all their assistants. Whereunto is adioyned another declaration of the same king, against the tovvnes of Paris, Orleance, Amyens, and Abbeuille and their adherentes. Faithfully translated out of the French.
author: France. Sovereign (1574-1589 : Henry III)
notes: A translation of: Declaration du roy sur l'attentat, felonnie & rebellion du duc de Mayenne.
Identified as STC 13097 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
